name: Luscious Pearl Necklace with Removable Chiffon Flower Brooch
description:
Gorgeous petal pink, dusty rose, and gray pearls (6mm) are matched to make a perfectly feminine multi-strand necklace. Swarovski crystals sparkle throughout the dusty rose pearls, making this piece come to life!

A removable chiffon flower brooch matches the delicate pink pearls and gives this necklace a flirty, feminine feel.

Wear this necklace doubled up for 6 beautiful 18 inch strands, or at its full length for 3 gorgeous 36 inch strands.

Definitely a head turner. Have I said that this piece is GORGEOUS?!

name: Mother of Pearl Wire Wrapped Pendant with Swarovski Crystals
description:
A beautiful Mother of Pearl whole shell is the focal piece for this pendant.
Its color combinations of purple, green, white, orange, and blue are STUNNING!

I've wire wrapped the shell in an abstract pattern, with triple wrapped loops on each end. The bottom loop holds three Swarovski bicone crystals in topaz, golden shadow, and clear crystal.

The handmade bail makes it easy to remove or replace the silver-plated chain of 22.5 inches, to accommodate any type of necklace.

I have never seen anything like this. If you like unique jewelry, this is definitely for you!

name: Copper Wrapped Aqua Chalcedony Briolette Pendant
description:
Stunning wire work adds interest to this beautiful pendant!

A gorgeous, Aqua Chalcedony teardrop briolette adorns this necklace.
The gemstone measures 12mm x 20mm, and has been hand carved.

The pendant hangs from a copper-plated chain, and can be shortened from its 22.5 inch length to suit your needs.

Chalcedony is stone that dates back to Roman times, where it was used as seals, for art, and was believed to have healing powers.

options.name: Choose from Silver wrapped, Gold wrapped, and different chain lengths to customize your purchase.
